creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: single blooming plum branch with three side branches and a small blooming twig near top end; three columns of calligraphy and two red chops at UR; one red chop below branch at LL and two red chops stacked in LRC
markings: five untranslated red chops: two L of calligraphy, two stacked in LRC and one below branch at LL
portfolio: From from the album "Three Friends of Winter"
title: Leaf from album "Three Friends of Winter"
